title: Nicky-and-the-Lost-Templar
description:
Nicky and the Lost Templar - By Alessandra Nadudvari

GREAT READ (listen) - BETTER THAN HARRY POTTER 

Files are high quality 44 hz, 96k. Reader is one of the best new talents in audiobooks.  

This is the first book in the "Adventures of Nicky" series, first published in print and ebook format in 2014, with the audio version created in late 2015. 

The book was inspired by a real ghost and contains many elements of truth. It takes place on an island in St. Margaret's Bay, Nova Scotia, just up the coast from Mahone Bay where the fabled Oak Island lies.

This torrent includes the first 14 chapters of the book, out of 20. The full text of the book can be found for free on Archive.org at https://archive.org/details/AlessandraNadudvariNickyAndTheLostTemplar

The full audio book or individual chapters can be purchased at http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/alessandranadudvari. Individual chapters are only $1.50 each. 

The second book in the series, "Nicky and the Lost Star" will be available in January. The third book, "Nicky and the Lost Sword" will be published in mid 2016. 

For more information about the "Adventures of Nicky" and its author please visit http://www.AdventuresofNicky.com. 

Check out the author's blog for more Nova Scotia mysteries and information about ravens and the Knights Templar
